titleStmt.title: A briefe answere of Thomas Harding Doctor of Diuinitie touching certaine vntruthes with which Maister Iohn Iuell charged him in his late sermon at Paules Crosse the VIII of Iuly, anno 1565.
titleStmt.author: Harding, Thomas, 1516-1572.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
